TopicTitle: you know a universe is dying when...

Articles.Content: 50. When the universe dies.
51. When the whole world starts whining about politics. (NOTE: obama sprays deadly chemtrails to make us all obsess about politics!!!!!!11111oneone1111)

when someone starts a post about the world ending.....AH SHIIII-

rip world.
53. When numbers cease to exist...again.
54. When someone takes 15 seconds to calculate that 6x9=54.
56. Off-by-one errors.

57. When people stop believing.

Aaaaand now I feel really depressed because of that... What are they no longer believing in? Why did they stop believing at all? These are the questions that keep me up at night...

58. Orbit doesn't go to sleep.

59: when a large number of people accidentally divide by zero at the same time

60: The day when "420" replaces "42" as the answer to universe and everything
61: When the sun wanders off into a corner of the sky.
62: When the sky wanders off into a corner of the Sun.
63. When the corner skies off to a sun of the Wander.
64. When logic goes off for a sandwich and never comes back.
65. When I don't get my daily bag of Dorito's.
66. When a Vorgon refuses to do paper work.
67. When Quebec decides not to be Canadian.
68. When Vorlons cease being cryptic.
69. When the NSA stops snooping.
70. When you find yourself in a restaurant.
71. When said restaurant begins the nightly entertainment.
72. When said entertainment in said restaurant isn't as entertaining as you thought it would be, and to top it all off the food is terrible.
73. When the restaurant's name is "Milliways"
74. The Black Sun dies, unleashing the Mad Mind upon the universe once again.
When your hyperspace drive won't disengage.
When 0 = 1
77. When 1 is a purely abstract concept with no relation to reality.
